system.description:
Make an INT check (Wayfinder applies) to find an herb you choose. If you fail, you can't use this talent again until you successfully complete a rest.

DC | Effect (Good for 1 Day)

9 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.m857P6MI00wAONTp]{Salve}. 3:6 chance of Healing 1 HP

12 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.QV93CYmgcgJ3UCPf]{Antitoxin}. Steps the effect of a poison

15 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.dBQr9YPyhvwyPm0g]{Stimulant}. ADV on WIS checks to perceive hidden things for 5 rounds

18 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.FeoRamUTz5jakMJ8]{Foebane}. ADV on attacks against one creature type you choose for [[/r 1d6]] rounds

21 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.VjFsjhM6CZjZ04RT]{Curative}. Equivalent to a @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.magic-items.jucTGEjsqJ1znHdf]{Potion of Healing}
